content.detailedDescription:
1) setting: front patio of house, 9:55pm wednesday june 6th, 2012
2) n/a
3) n/a
4) listed below
5) farfetched/skeptical, excited/intrigued
6) lost sight as it disappeared over horizon

first unidentified object:

1) large bright lighted "orb." appeared spherical, light did not waver nor did it blink (as if a plane, helicopter would)
2) within atmosphere, at least 1 mile from surface, relative to passenger plane altitudes
3) origin west, direction east- strict path, did not stray from route
4) pace was significantly faster than a plane/helicopter yet, was in view for approximately 2-3 minutes

second unidentified object:

1) same characteristics as first ufo but smaller in size, originated from north west heading east. 
2) seen approximately 5 minutes after first ufo witness.
content.summary: 2 bright white, unwavering orbs heading east at moderately fast pace. w/in atmosphere

content.detailedDescription:
I litterally just opened my back door and let my dog out for a pee. looked up and immediatley saw this amazing bright star pretty much straight over head. only thing was it was basically overhead and was really really bright and moving pretty fast. 

i hold a canadian commercial pilots licence and routinley watch the night sky. this was different in the way that i could not see any normal lights on a plane; no strobe no green or red or flashing red tail light. just one very bright silent with no exaust trail. i could not make a shape out as it was soo bright and quite high. i followed it with my eye untill it went on its path into the distance and disapeared out of sight behind the trees.

i dont know what it was but it got my attention. 

i tried to take video with my iphone but realized the video was not showing the object.
content.summary: Silent very brightn light

content.detailedDescription: I know more than i can say  i know they 1 of 3 types of et 2 of witch are frindley and 1 is hostail  i an 1 that was chsaen by the et s the info comes alittel at a time
content.summary: Talked to me without saying a word told me they are our creator ad it changed my life

content.detailedDescription: This is in response to the michigan sighting the morning of the 6th of june in michigan. dude, i seen very similar things for almost a year now. in fact i saw one last night heading south to north maybe 30 minutes before the iss went over. i have been reporting these for some time.
content.summary: Lights that fade out then get super bright

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were sitting on my porch and we were watching this bright object in the sky. we were watching it because it was so bright and was not moving at all. i got my binoculars and a camera and we started to really watch it. i started taking pictures and this object started to change shapes. when it was round, we could see that the inside was fire engine red. if you zoom in on the pictures you can see little black objects that look as if they are heading towards this object. we didn't see the black objects until i zoomed in on the pictures. after about 4-5 hours of watching this object that never moved, just changed shapes, it appeared that a beam of light (like a flashlight beam) came out of the bottom and then it just disappeared. my pictures came out very well. i have a friend who was driving home around 5:)) p.M. and spotted this same object. he managed to get one picture on his cell phone.
content.summary: Object changed shape, inside glowed red when it was round

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on us 165 in louisiana near the exit to pawnee.  it was a very beautiful clear day in late december of 1969 when i saw a ufo huvering only five feet off the highway.  there were two cars on the sholder of the north bound side and three cars on the south bound shoulder.  i stoped and watched as this beautiful crome colored craft with light of  red and green going counter clockwise around the middle of the craft.  one third of the top half of the craft appeard to be mirrored glass because of the light smoke gray coloration compaired to the metalic part of the craft.  the bottem half of the craft had a vented extention of about one third the diameter of the width.  this extention was what appeard to be the motor part of the disk.  the lights moved around the black belted area in the middle with one light bright red the next was clear pure green, one light was white and it roated around with the other lights but came around only once every six to eight seconds.  i along with all the other witnesses watch as the craft houvered then rotated by elevating on the west side to about 45 degrees and climbed above the trees on the east side and leveled above the rail road tracks where it stayed for thirty to forty seconds then rotated and went to the exact same place over the highway where is stayed motionless for thirty to fourty seconds then rotated on its east side and climed to the west of the highway.  it leveled and remained there for the same amount of time.  the craft went back to the position over the highway and repeated the manovers once more just as before.  this time is leveled over the highway remained there for about fourty seconds and tilted to the west and moved slowly to the west between the trees.  it changed to about sixty to sixty five degrees and started moving upward to the north west.  it started slowly increasing speed very smoothly but in a compounding increasing speed until it climed out of sight in the stratisphere in about three seconds.  the craft made no nose of anykind that i could dectect.  it has been a long time and now that i'm older i will tell my incounter.  it was an experance that i will not forget.  as far as i know none of the people who witnessed this has ever come forward.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Up close view of beautiful chrome sauser with rotating red and green lights within sixty five feet.

content.detailedDescription:
Photos from my game camera. looks like the moon. the moon was 80% that night and rising at the same time of the photos. however, the object is round, not 80%. the object changes direction, whereas the moon would follow a path. the object is below the horizon in some of the photos, whereas the moon can't go in front of trees. i can't explain it.

i am attaching the consecutive photos downloaded from my game camera. because there was a small tree, approximately 1" in diameter in front of my game camera, over a 2 month period, it took over 6,000 photos every time the small tree moved. therefore, i deleted most of the photos, which were many photos of nothing. there were a fair number of photos from deer. no hogs. some crows. as i stated above, if that is the moon, i can't explain why it changed directions and went below the horizon. the trees in the distance are a planted pine plantation, so the moon should be hidden or partially hidden when it is behind the trees. out of the 6,000 photos that the game camera took in that two month period, the attached photos are the only photos that have this object, which may be the moon or may not be the moon. what i can't do now is look through the other photos that i deleted to see if the moon should have been rising in that direction at a certain time, for comparison.

one thought is that it could be from a helicopter, but why would there be a helicopter flying in this area, which is a clear-cut area of a pine plantation at 3 am? also, why would a helicopter be there, hovering for 40 minutes?

also, someone mentioned that it could be dust on the lens, but dust would not be illuminated by the flash, so it can't be that.

the photos are titled grand marquis because i have the back seat of a grand marquis in my hunting blind.
content.summary: This ufo was not observed in person. i have photos from a game camera pointed west.

content.detailedDescription: A friend took a picture of the full moon on that date through their closed kitchen window. the thumbnail size photo in the camera showed a glow on the right side of the photo. it wasn't until i downloaded the photo to the computer and looked at the enlarged picture where the images showed what that glow was. i thought it was a reflection of their kitchen light but they do not have any fixtures in their home that matches the photo. i also considered a possible double exposier but, can that happen with a digital camera ? also, this person is just a novice picture taker. i'm not sure what it is, so i'm sharing with the you, the experts.
content.summary: Glowing image discovered in a photo taken of a full moon

content.detailedDescription:
Time: 4:00am est (exaclty)
location: macomb, mi near 23 mile and romeo plank
weather: clear sky, no clouds.
path: from the north traveling due south

lead up to sighting:  could not sleep, stepped outside to have a cigarette. was looking up at the stars and then i saw what i thought was satellite.

the sighting:  what i thought was satellite pulsed a very bright white light and then dimmed to be totally unoberservable. a few seconds later, the light again pulsed and the object has moved some distance from where i had first seen the object.  

the pulsing of the light was totally periodic - it was not chaotic or random; it had a period of maybe 5 seconds.  between pulses, the object was totally and completely unoberservable.

cnsidering i thought as first it was satellite, the altitude had to be extremely high.  size could not be estimated.  

the sighting lasted for a few minutes as the object travelled to the south. and then, about 45 degrees from my vantage point, the light simply stopped pulsating, and the object as stated before was again unobservable and that is how the sighting concluded.

final note: the direction was north to south, but the flight path started to change at towards the end of the sighting, as the object then began to travel south-east.  satellites don't do that.  

the light (when pulsing) was much too bright to be a satellite, it was more like a bright star.

definately not an airplane... definately not a meteor because it was too slow and flight path changed, not to mention meteors don't pulsate bright white light.

just another ufo sighting that won't help anyone figure this stuff out....
content.summary: Appeared to be a satellite, at first, until it reglarily pulsed  bright white light

content.detailedDescription:
this is a graphic depiction of an unknown object that was seen in the skies of a small town in western, ky on a warm summer night the stars were out not a cloud in the sky. it moved at a slow pace from south to north no noise was heard  it was almost like it was floating in the sky and no it wasn���t a weather balloon it���s altitude wasn���t very high. it had what appeared to be ports on the side of the object which appeared to in circle this cigar shaped ship. can���t remember the exact date but it was witnessed by myself and my sister i believe the time frame was mid 70���s to early 80���s ��� why haven���t i mentioned this to anyone before now, well i didn���t know about m.U.F.O.N or i would have - i also read the project blue that was released to the public ��� i believe they should have called project white wash, that���s about all it was the so called investigation into the possibility of exterterestrials visiting our planet was have explained  the real truth, they intimidated those who did report such sightings and stated they where only a few reports that couldn���t be explained they used the usual excuses, swamp gas,blimps, aircraft, stars and even hysteria ��� my question is how would they explain mass hysteria considering all the ufo sightings that were reported throughout the years even back to the ancient times.. i as well as my sister have observed several ufo���s of different shapes colors and sizes of which when you contact me about the copy write of my stories i will be glad to help fill your data files. can you imagine how many reports that went not reported for fear of being called crazy or more intimation from the military?

��� mn 6-05-2012           date written 06-05-2012.
content.summary: Long cigar shaped rounded to a point front a back it had dome on top looked like portals all around object  - just had a orange glow - no noise - appeared to float from south to north - very large
Like a switch beam of light appears in dirrection i was gazzing at, streaked across the sky, disappeard like turning off a light
Like a switch beam of light appears in dirrection i was gazzing at, streaked across the sky, disappeard like turning off a light

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the frount yard looking up , noticed a light moving across night sky slowly looked like a star but lower , no flashing lights . shortly after a plane a little lower going the other way lights flashing .
content.summary: Light going across night sky  slowly  from south west to north east

content.detailedDescription:
Driving down a back road when i had the feeling to look out my driver side window. in my peripheral i saw a perfect glowing shade of aqua blue ring in the sky, just barely in the clouds. it moved fast at first then slowed down really quick, hovered with a slight jerky movement then took off again in the same direction for what looked like a couple hundred feet and disappeared from the sky. when i first saw the object i thought it was a falling star, but then i noticed the shape of it and it was between an oval and a circle and had a ring of blue/green glowing light. the clouds around it were glowing white and it was just enough to be able to see a shape in the clouds with the object. the center was a very dark color. i could tell from it moving that it was in the clouds cause it made a tracer of light behind it. 
i kept looking in the sky after it disappeared to make sure it wasn't a helicopter/airplane, but nothing was found.
at first i freaked out cause i didn't know what it was and almost ran off the road. my eyes teared up from the overstimulating excitement when i realized what i had just seen. i called my sister to tell her about it.
i lost site of the object cause the light disappeared from the sky, didn't ascend or descend it just vanished.
content.summary: Blue/green shaped ring, fast speed, hovered took off & disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Beam of light laser like only dimmer shinning from west to east i think could be other ...Thunder cloud in the north .. the lightning showed it up well in the night sky,,so i said jet trail .. but it stayed in the sky for and hour and a half,,like a laser still focosed sh*t i cant spell....So i said well hell i got a night vision scope if its a cloud left by a jet i can tell this way ... i was shocked it was a beam of light green throug my night vison so i call my friends wife just to see if i was losing my mind ,,she seen it my wife sen it ..I had to wake her up but  three pople seen it ..It was a laser in the sky .... i only hope more people seen it ......Im felling realy messed up right now ... just turned in a report last week ...I really feel screwed right now ...It took me fourtyfive years to tell someone about the other stuff ...And now  beam in the sky ,,,
content.summary: Beam from north west to south east

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend was driving home as observed this. she just contacted me with all her information and being aware of mufon, i posted this.
content.summary: Very large object observed over the atlantic ocean with red strobing lights

content.detailedDescription: A co-worker and i went outside and saw 2 white objects flying north from our location. these were either drones or ufo's. the objects were silent but appeared to be flying together.
content.summary: 2 drones or ufo's these were not planes

content.detailedDescription:
Setting up camping equitment,radio started to buzz,looked like a piece of glass.

started to walk back to it,i was about 20 to35 feet from it.It was floating above the ground about a foot or two. the ship was like glass you could see right threw it. i was now about 10 ft or less from the starship.A door slide open and a ramp began to slide out and touch the ground and stop. there was no sound as this was going on. as i reached out to touch it i heard something move behind. before i could turn around i felt something touch my back of my neck,it was hot and cold at the same time.Everything went black. when i awoke i was at least 500 ft from where i saw the object. i got my things together and began to walk home. about three hours later as i reached home i saw my parents all dressed up like they were just coming from church. they ask me where i had been i told them i was camping. i made a smart remark about then being dressed up. her reply was we always get dressed up for church.   it was friday afternoon that i left to go camping,it was now sunday ,i had lost at lease 24 hours
content.summary: Could see right threw it

content.detailedDescription: Coming home one night from work there was this ship that just came out nowhere and hoovered in front my truck.I slow down and it stay with me right in front of my truck . i follow it for about 3 miles it then turned in to a field and stop.I stop and watch it for about 5-6 min it had a light looking for something in the field .So i just drove off.It was still there the whole time i was on that road till i turned.I wish now i had gotting out and appoch it.
content.summary: I was driving home from work and saw this ship hoovering over  my truck.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside office to get lunch at street. when returning i was looking for venus as the "eclipse" neared (around 1:35 pm). i notice a sea gull and a jet and what appeared to be another jet but, upon further observance, noticed it looked more like a cross between and jet and a bird. it was west of my position and moved very slowly to the north. it appeared to be several miles away and several miles high. the day was clear and i could see the jet at 30-35,000 feet with an obvious vapor trail. the "wings" appeared to reflect some of the sun light, but not as a pure metallic reflection. more of a hybrid metallic reflection. it moved very slowly as a jet would appear to move. i glanced away and back again and it was still there. i thought i'd get my phone out and take a picture or video, but when i looked back it was no where to be seen. i looked for several more minutes and then decided to go back into the office.

while eating lunch inside i couldn't stop thinking about it so i went back outside and sat in my car looking for the object again. i saw two more jets with vapor trails over the next 15 minutes. then i decided to go back into work and i got out of my car. then i saw it again. this time lower in elevation but in the same general location. it appeared darker than before but i knew it was the same object i saw previously. it was large and difficult to see...Almost invisible. i watched it for about 10 seconds trying not to take my eyes off of it. they started to water and i wiped them. it was still there not really moving in any direction. i reached for my phone and searched for the camera function. when i finally launched the program and looked back for the object it was gone. i sat there for another 20 minutes but was unable to spot it again. it is nearly 3 now and i am going out to observe the venus eclipse and search again for the ufo.

i will sketch what i thought i saw and submit it later. i took a picture in the area after it vanished but have not looked at the picture yet. i will after i type this and observe the eclipse.
content.summary: Object appeared oddly like aircraft, but wasn't. disappeared when i looked away and back. went back outside 45 min later and saw it briefly again before it just vanished.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to our local gas station and in the south sky i saw an unusually bright light that just stayed in one spot for several minutes. i turned in my vehicle and the light was hidden by trees when i passed the trees it was no longer in the sky. i looked to the right (northern sky) to see if i was okay to turn onto my road and i saw what i'm assuming was the same light, color and size was the same. and it streaked across the sky very fast and had a really long tail behind it and then it vanished. at this point i was in my driveway feeling a little strange, shakey ect. i live on a farm house and when i got out of my vehicle the cows were going nuts, making noises and slamming into the gate. i've lived here for several years and never one time have i seen the cows do that in the day time let alone 11:45 at night. i don't know that it was related but not even 3 minutes after i saw it streak through the sky i heard sirens and saw several emergency response vehicles headed in the direction that the "ufo" was traveling.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hovering light, streaks across sky, scares the cows.

content.detailedDescription: A co-worker and i were outside on break at about 255 am. we work 3rd shift at the foundry in cadillac michigan, we were gazing the moon as it was full and wondering how many miles away it was, the moon was to the southwest, to the left of our periphial, we almost simultaniousley, noticed a starlike object appearing almost chrome. the object was traveling from south to the north moving slowly for about 2-3 seconds then it stopped for about a second, maybe 2 got brighter, it changed from a duller shiney starlike object, to 4-5 times the intensity. and then ascending straight up vertically speeding up until it was out of sight into deep space. deep, beyond the visible stars. the ascention was quick lasting maybe 3-4 seconds. at first site, i began to say "theres the spacestation",but all i got out was "theres the.." realizing, in that same breath, i was looking east not west. we were both equally as shocked as the other. and were basically dumbfound. it had a strange effect on me. because i knew it was not of this earth. having served in the airforce, from 86-90 on a black project with top secret and krypto clearance, and in the national guard currently, since 01 living on an airfield at a firestation. 15 years being familiar with fixed and rotary winged aircraft recognition both day and nightime,it was not something of our level of technology, that i can fathom. i want to see more. i am very intrigued. it will last with me forever.
content.summary: Witnessed a starlike object ascend vertically

content.detailedDescription: Looked up and saw a very bright white star,took out cell phone started video,and captured a very unusual fluttering,swaying,side to side,changing colors,from blue/green/yellow/orange/amber.Still have it on my cell phone,its locked but i can send it to another cell phone that takes videos for more analysis.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.shape: Boomerang,   Circle,   Disc,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Looked like a big bright star,cell phone captured something different,when i looked at it when i got home.

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting my indiana hometown last week and while there positioned a bushnell hunter's cam in little eagle creek cemetary for friday's full moon night.  as i've deduced there is a connection between ufo sightings and 40 degrees latitude, the graveyard is located 2,000 ft north of 151st street in carmel indiana, which is where 40 degrees latitude flows east/west.  the cam was positioned in front of the mason's obelisk monument facing wsw.  question is, did the rod emerge from or enter into the obelisk, as it's not captured in either in the preceding or succeeding pictures.
content.summary: Rod captured in indiana graveyard near 40 degrees latitude

content.detailedDescription: On march 2, 2012 at approximately 8:50pm my wife and i were traveling south bound on u.S. hwy 81.  we were just outside of the town of okarche, ok when we noticed what we thought was an aircraft with a red pulsing light on one end and a blue pulsing light on the other gliding over a field just east of okarche heading east.  we could only see the lights and not the object itself as it was very dark out.  it struck me as strange as it was moving slowly and had no other beacon or strobe lights normally found on aircraft.  we kept driving onto ok state hwy 3 towards oklahoma city, ok and watched the lights head east and go out of sight.  at approximately 9:00pms we were approximately 8 miles east of okarche when i happened to look to my right (south) and see what appeared to be a tower base of some kind with the same lights on top of it the base right next to a farm house.  out of curiosity i decided to pull on to a road in front of the farm house (exact address unknown) to see if we could see it up close.  the lights were stationary there approximately tree top level maybe a little higher and approximately 50ft from our position.  it was really dark and we could not make out the shape of the object.  we could only see the lights.  as we pulled up i rolled down my window to get a better look and heard no sound at all except that of traffic on the nearby highway.  we sat there for about 10 seconds looking at the lights when all the sudden the object began moving west away from us which surprised us.  it started off moving slow, however, in the 10 seconds or so it took me to get back on the highway the lights were already approximately 5 miles away heading back towards okarche.  we were amazed at how far it had travelled in just a 10 second period especially watching it travel so slowly earlier.  we watched it glide back west then north until it was out of sight.  on a side note i had observed the same lights over okarche about a month prior to this sighting but did not have time to turn around and check it out.  i just happened to be telling my wife about that sighting when we encountered it this time around.  again at that time all i could see where the lights and not the object shape itself.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Unknown lights over oklahoma
